title: Episode #30: Benjamin Wittes Gives a Talk at Parliament on Whether Drones are the New Guantanamo
itunes:title: Episode #30: Benjamin Wittes Gives a Talk at Parliament on Whether Drones are the New Guantanamo
itunes:subtitle: Lawfare's editor in chief, Benjamin Wittes, gives a talk at the Palace of Westminster--sponsored by the Henry Jackson Society--on whether drones are becoming the new Guantanamo.
description:
Lawfare's editor in chief, Benjamin Wittes, gives a talk at the Palace of Westminster--sponsored by the Henry Jackson Society--on whether drones are becoming the new Guantanamo.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
